###Read in Data
```{r, echo=TRUE}


array = c("mmm", "aapl")


stocks_2005 = list()

for (i in 1:length(array)) {
  
  dir = c("../Stocks/", as.character(array[i]), ".us.txt")
  dir2 = str_c(dir, collapse = "")
  stock = read.table(dir2, sep=",", header=TRUE)
  stock[3] <- NULL
  stock[3] <- NULL
  stock[4] <- NULL
  stock[4] <- NULL
  stock[2] <- NULL
  
  stock$name <- array[i]
  
  stocks_2005[[i]] <- stock
  
  
}

stocks_2005[[1]]
stocks_2005[[2]]
```

```{r, echo=TRUE}
array = c("mmm")
stocks_2005 = list()

stock = read.table(dir2, sep=",", header=TRUE)
for (i in 1:length(array)) {
  stock_close_03 <- stock[which(stock$Date == "2005-03-01"),]$Close 
  stock_close_03$name <- array[i]
}
stock_close_03
```
